metadata.title: CVE-2019-10894 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Wireshark 2.4.0 to 2.4.13, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and 3.0.0, the GSS-APIdissector could crash. This was addressed inepan/dissectors/packet-gssapi.c by ensuring that a valid dissector iscalled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10894` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.8-1
libwireshark14 - 2.6.8-1
libwiretap11 - 2.6.8-1
libwsutil12 - 2.6.8-1
tshark - 2.6.8-1
wireshark - 2.6.8-1
wireshark-common - 2.6.8-1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.8-1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.8-1').
